thread.title: Kim Kardashian Wears a Sweat Suit to Help Her Lose 7 Pounds
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian Wears a Sweat Suit to Help Her Lose 7 Pounds

author: Rachel McRady
title: Kim Kardashian Wears a Sweat Suit to Help Her Lose 7 Pounds
text: Kim Kardashian Wears a Sweat Suit to Help Her Lose 7 Pounds by Rachel McRady 2:06   Photo: KimKardashianWest.com Kim Kardashian isn’t afraid of a little sweat! The 36-year-old reality star took to Snapchat on Tuesday to share her new weight loss goal with her fans. In one video, Kim wrote, “7 pounds to get to 115 pounds." WATCH: Blac Chyna Reveals She’s Lost 40 Lbs. Since Giving Birth to Daughter Dream 3 Months Ago To get to her goal, the mother of two is working out and also dressing differently. A post shared by Kim Kardashian Snapchats (@kimksnapchats) on Feb 21, 2017 at 9:55am PST "Don just called me Missy Elliott. Look it, I'm wearing a full sweat suit 'cause I gotta lose this extra, like 7 pounds,” she said while showing off her baggy black suit. Kim’s workout routine was recently called into question by her younger sister, Khloe Kardashian, who joked with Ellen DeGeneres about Kim’s exercise regimen. Saying the Selfish author does "not have intense workouts," the Revenge Body host added, "How do you have this body? I can't handle people like that. I wish that was me. I'm jealous." A post shared by Kim Kardashian West (@kimkardashian) on Feb 17, 2017 at 10:29am PST And Kim isn’t the only member of family trying to shed the pounds. Her former pal and future sister-in-law, Blac Chyna, also took to Snapchat to share her post-baby weight loss goals with her fans. “From 192 to 152.4 – Goal 130 – Summer 2017,” Chyna captioned a video of herself on the scale. For more from Chyna’s weight loss journey, watch the clip below! RELATED SLIDESHOW
